Text: This is an astonishing deed, cetme308 - thank you so much for sharing!
You're welcome!  It actually started as a way to get the files to a Dr. friend on the other side of the world...  I had no idea it would be so popular.  I just wish my upload speed was a bit faster.

dear sir, i love ur collection, and want to help seeding.
my D drive is the destination for torrent, but i need to move to drive J after finishing, for enough space in D to get new part. How can I change seeding souce from D to J so I can continue seeding old parts ???
and, thanks, u are a gentleman and scholar

Assuming you use µTorrent:
Stop the torrent. Move the folder from drive D to J. Right-click the torrent in µTorrent -> Advanced -> Set download location (or delete only the torrent and re-add it). Point it to the new location and start the torrent. It should automatically do a hash check on the files to make sure they're complete.
The MRI of the Brain and Spine 3rd ed. is corrupt, but I've re-uploaded it here: https://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8421291/Medical_e-books_part_17_missing_files_(MRI_of_the_Brain_and_Spin
